data.text: Pamenepo Zofari wa ku Naama anayankha kuti,
“Kodi mawu ambirimbiriwa nʼkukhala osayankhidwa?
Kodi anthu nʼkukhala chete atamva kubwebweta kwakoku?
Iwe ukunena kwa Mulungu kuti, ‘Zikhulupiriro zanga ndi zopanda zolakwika
Aa, nʼkanakonda Mulungu akanayankhula
ndi kukuwululira chinsinsi cha nzeru yake,
“Kodi iwe ungathe kumvetsa zinsinsi za Mulungu?
Zili kutali kupambana mayiko akumwamba, nanga ungachite chiyani?
Muyeso wa nzeru zake ndi wautali kupambana dziko lapansi
“Ngati Iye atabwera ndi kukutsekera mʼndende
Ndithudi, Mulungu amazindikira anthu achinyengo;
Munthu wopanda nzeru sizingatheke kukhala wanzeru
“Koma ngati upereka mtima wako kwa Iye
ngati utaya tchimo limene lili mʼdzanja lako
udzatukula mutu wako wosachita manyazi;
Udzayiwala ndithu zowawa zako,
Moyo wako udzawala kupambana usana,
Udzalimba mtima popeza pali chiyembekezo;
Udzagona pansi, popanda wina wokuopseza
Koma anthu oyipa adzafuna thandizo osalipeza,
